name: tedgoas
description: Ted Goas is a reliable product designer and front-end developer working on websites, applications, and HTML emails.

scripts.serve: npm run clean && npm run postcss && cross-env NODE_ENV=development eleventy --serve
scripts.watch: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development eleventy --watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run postcss && cross-env NODE_ENV=production eleventy

author: Ted Goas
